article.headline: McNeese State 78, Sam Houston St. 65
article.story: LAKE CHARLES, La. (AP) -- Jerrick Oliver scored 20 points and grabbed 12 rebounds to help lead McNeese State to a 78-65 win over Sam Houston State on Thursday night. Oliver wasn't the only Cowboy to post a double-double. Bryce May scored 12 points and pulled down 13 rebounds. Edward Garriet added 13 points and Eldridge Lewis had 12 for McNeese State (7-16, 3-9 Southland). Joe Thompson led Sam Houston State (12-11, 7-5) with 28 points and Wilder Auguste added 15. The score was tied at 61 when the Cowboys went on an 8-0 run to take control of the game as time ticked away.
